notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, M.R., A.R.T.S.A.; writing—original draft preparation, M.R., A.C.L., F.V., M.F.; writing—review and editing, G.A., M.P.R., P.C., A.R.T.S.A.; funding acquisition, M.R., M.P.R., P.C., A.R.T.S.A. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
